⟨b.cyn⟩remark: "proto4" isn't real, it can't hurt you
⟨blu⟩  --> foo.proto:1:10
  ⟨blu⟩ |
⟨blu⟩ 1 | ⟨reset⟩syntax = "proto4"
⟨blu⟩   | ⟨reset⟩⟨reset⟩     ⟨b.cyn⟩^^^^^^^^^ ⟨b.cyn⟩help: change this to "proto5"
⟨blu⟩   |
⟨reset⟩
⟨b.red⟩error: missing `;`
⟨blu⟩  --> foo.proto:1:18
  ⟨blu⟩ |
⟨blu⟩ 1 | ⟨reset⟩syntax = "proto4"
⟨blu⟩   | ⟨reset⟩⟨reset⟩             ⟨b.red⟩^ ⟨b.red⟩here
⟨blu⟩   |
⟨reset⟩
⟨b.cyn⟩remark: EOF
⟨blu⟩  --> foo.proto:7:2
  ⟨blu⟩ |
⟨blu⟩ 7 | ⟨reset⟩}
⟨blu⟩   | ⟨reset⟩⟨b.cyn⟩^ ⟨b.cyn⟩here
⟨blu⟩   |
⟨reset⟩
⟨b.red⟩error: package
⟨blu⟩  --> foo.proto:3:1
  ⟨blu⟩ |
⟨blu⟩ 3 | ⟨reset⟩package abc.xyz;
⟨blu⟩   | ⟨b.red⟩^^^^^^^⟨reset⟩⟨reset⟩    ⟨b.blu⟩- ⟨b.blu⟩semicolon
⟨blu⟩   |  ⟨b.red⟩|
⟨blu⟩   |  ⟨b.red⟩package
⟨blu⟩   |
⟨reset⟩
⟨b.red⟩error: package
⟨blu⟩  --> foo.proto:3:1
  ⟨blu⟩ |
⟨blu⟩ 3 | ⟨reset⟩package abc.xyz;
⟨blu⟩   | ⟨b.red⟩^^^^^^^
⟨blu⟩   |  ⟨b.red⟩|
⟨blu⟩   |  ⟨b.red⟩unreasonably long error message that needs to wrap for it to look good
⟨blu⟩   |
⟨reset⟩
⟨b.red⟩error: this is an overlapping error
⟨blu⟩  --> foo.proto:3:1
  ⟨blu⟩ |
⟨blu⟩ 3 | ⟨reset⟩package abc.xyz;
⟨blu⟩   | ⟨b.red⟩^^^^^^^ ⟨b.red⟩package
⟨blu⟩   | ⟨b.blu⟩---------------- ⟨b.blu⟩package decl
⟨blu⟩   |
⟨reset⟩
⟨b.red⟩error: P A C K A G E
⟨blu⟩  --> foo.proto:3:1
  ⟨blu⟩ |
⟨blu⟩ 3 | ⟨reset⟩package abc.xyz;
⟨blu⟩   | ⟨b.red⟩^⟨reset⟩⟨b.blu⟩-- ⟨b.blu⟩help: ck
⟨blu⟩   | ⟨reset⟩⟨reset⟩ ⟨b.blu⟩-- ⟨b.blu⟩help: ge
⟨blu⟩   | ⟨b.red⟩|
⟨blu⟩   | ⟨b.red⟩help: p
⟨blu⟩   |
⟨reset⟩
⟨b.red⟩error: P A C K A G E
⟨blu⟩  --> foo.proto:3:1
  ⟨blu⟩ |
⟨blu⟩ 3 | ⟨reset⟩package abc.xyz;
⟨blu⟩   | ⟨b.red⟩^⟨reset⟩⟨b.blu⟩-- ⟨b.blu⟩help: ck
⟨blu⟩   | ⟨reset⟩⟨reset⟩ ⟨b.blu⟩----------- ⟨b.blu⟩decl
